Class ViewSlot

Represents a slot or location within the DOM to which views can be added and removed. Manages the view lifecycle for its children.

Hierarchy

  • ViewSlot

Index

  • constructor

Constructors

constructor

  • new ViewSlot(anchor: Node, anchorIsContainer: boolean, animator?: Animator): ViewSlot
    • Defined in node_modules/aurelia-templating/dist/aurelia-templating.d.ts:1174

    Creates an instance of ViewSlot.

    Parameters

    • anchor: Node

      The DOM node which will server as the anchor or container for insertion.

    • anchorIsContainer: boolean

      Indicates whether the node is a container.

    • Optional animator: Animator

      The animator that will controll enter/leave transitions for this slot.

    Returns ViewSlot

    • Defined in node_modules/aurelia-templating/dist/aurelia-templating.d.ts:1239

    Removes a view from the slot.

    Parameters

    • view: View

      The view to remove.

    • Optional returnToCache: boolean

      Should the view be returned to the view cache?
